results.title: Room for rent in Royal Wharf apartment
results.overview: A 2-bed, 2-bath apartment in Royal Wharf, East London, with two room options: a non-en-suite room for £1200 pcm and an en-suite room for £1300 pcm, including some bills
results.description: Best room deal in the area 🚀 Hi everyone I’m Izhaan (current flatmate)✨ I’m looking for a flatmate to share a beautiful 2-bed, 2-bath apartment in Royal Wharf (E16) honestly one of the most aesthetic places in East London, right by the river and surrounded by parks 🌊🌳. The prices are the lowest comparatively to any other listing in the area You’ll have two room options: 🛋️ Non-En-Suite – Bright, spacious double room with your own private bathroom just outside – £1200 pcm (some bills included). 🛁 En-Suite – A massive double room with loads of space and a stunning shower – £1300 pcm (some bills included). The building itself feels like a lifestyle upgrade: 🏋️‍♂️ Fully equipped residents-only gym (largest gym in east London) 🏊‍♀️ 25m swimming pool + Jacuzzi, sauna & steam 🛡️ 24/7 Concierge & Security 🌿 Large balcony + riverside walkways Transport is super convenient: 🚉 5 mins to West Silvertown & Pontoon Dock DLR 🚆 1 stop to Canning Town (Jubilee & DLR) 🚌 8 min bus to Elizabeth Line ⏱️ 20 min to Stratford, 35 min to Central London 📅 Move-in date: 14th October If you’re tidy, easy-going, and want a modern home with great vibes and amazing facilities, drop me a message – would love to hear from you! 🌿💫 A little about me: - Impeccably hygienic (think of me as the cleanliness champion) - Respectful and friendly (I bring good vibes and good manners) - A pro at sharing spaces (no awkward moments here) I work in marketing. I don’t have any pets and I don’t smoke A bit about my hobbies: - Avid reader (always ready for a book recommendation) - Cooking enthusiast (I make a mean pasta) - Fitness buff (you might find me at the gym or running outside) Reach out to me on messenger or comment on this post Best, Izhaan
results.reliabilityReason: The post includes detailed information about the apartment, photos, and contact details, with no apparent scam indicators

results.title: Double room for rent in West Hampstead flat
results.overview: A double room is available in a recently refurbished flat in West Hampstead, with a light and airy atmosphere, and a decently sized balcony overlooking a well-maintained garden.
results.description: Double room in West Hampstead flat -1,200 PCM (bills not included) - available now Greetings! We recently moved into this stunning property in West Hampstead and are looking for a third person to join us on a long-term basis. About the property: -Light, recently refurbished first floor apartment with wooden floors on a peaceful (and rather grand) avenue in NW3. -Open plan living area which leads out onto a decently sized balcony overlooking a well maintained garden. -Relatively large, recently refurbished kitchen. -Two full bathrooms and a powder room, so no race for the loo. -Five minute walk to the Heath, 15 to West Hampstead shops, 20 to Hampstead village. About the room (pictured): - 1,200 PCM cold. Not yet sure how much bills will be since we just moved in, but split between three. -Light, double bedroom which overlooks the aforementioned well maintained garden, with built-in wardrobes which have space for drawers and hanging. -Currently unfurnished, but could furnish for the right person. About us: Karina: A 33 year old who loves to travel and explore London! Keeps herself busy going for walks or catching up with friends. Lydia: A 32 year old who enjoys drinking beer, cooking, skiing, running, watching the ruby, and playing her flute (a mythical event which only happens when noone is around). Celeste: Lydia's short sidekick, Celeste, is a long-haired miniature dachshund (pictured) whose hobbies are known to include kissing (much to Karina's distaste), and wagging her tail. Exceptionally loving and relaxed, she makes for exemplary company. YOU: We’re looking for a third flatmate (of any gender) who is friendly, clean and easygoing. In the ideal world, we would love to live with someone we could call a friend and occasionally share a laugh and a wine (or tea) with - although, we do appreciate that there will be times when you want to close your door on the world and watch Survivor.
results.reliabilityReason: The post includes photos, a detailed description of the property and the room, and information about the current flatmates, which suggests a high level of completeness and transparency, and does not seem to be a scam.

results.title: Double Room for Rent in Stepney Green
results.overview: A fully furnished double room in a shared house, located near Stepney Green station, with modern amenities and a private garden.
results.description: Stylish Double Room – Stepney Green, E1 Located just 10 minutes’ walk from Stepney Green station, this fully furnished and renovated 4-bedroom shared house offers modern living with plenty of comfort. The property features a fully equipped kitchen, shared bathroom and toilet, a private garden, plus Smart TV & Smart Lock in every room for extra security and convenience. Currently, only 1 male tenant lives in the house – leaving plenty of space for new flatmates. Room 1 – Available 10th September | £1,100 PCM (single use only) Deposit: 1 month’s rent | Minimum stay: 7 months All bills included – gas, electricity, water, council tax, superfast fibre WiFi, and regular maintenance. Students and recent graduates are welcome (3 months’ rent upfront + deposit may be required if not employed or without proof of income). Support is provided through a mobile app for easy communication and maintenance requests. Excellent location with shops, cafes, and transport links nearby. We are Let Connect Agency, helping students and professionals find comfortable accommodation across London. Send us a message today to get more details.
results.reliabilityReason: The listing provides a detailed description of the property, includes photos, and has a clear pricing and billing structure, with a reputable agency behind it.
